articles.author: Compiled by Craig Taylor
articles.title: Proteas qualify for World Cup after Ireland, Bangladesh ODI washout
articles.description: The Proteas have qualified for the 2023 Cricket World Cup later this year in India after the first one-day international between Ireland and Bangladesh at Chelmsford was washed out on Tuesday.
articles.content:
The Proteas have qualified for the 2023 Cricket World Cup later this year in India after the first one-day international between Ireland and Bangladesh at Chelmsford was washed out on Tuesday.

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Pakistan's Former Prime Minister Imran Khan Is Arrested, His Party Says
articles.description: The arrest drew nationwide condemnation from the supporters of the popular opposition leader and former cricket star.
articles.content:
Supporters of Pakistan's former Prime Minister Imran Khan chant slogans next to burning tires during a protest to condemn the arrest of their leader, in Hyderabad, Pakistan, on May 9, 2023.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
